name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Areas
description: This is a repository of areas APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: HERE
apis.description: HERE Technologies enables people, enterprises and cities around the world to harness the power of location and create innovative solutions that make our lives safer and more efficient. We transform information from devices, vehicles, infrastructure and...

apis.name: Entertainment Express
apis.description: Internet Video Archive (IVA) is a leading entertainment data company providing metadata, images and trailers/clips, for movie and TV content. With the launch of its award-winning Entertainment Express APIs, clients can easily access everything they need to create engaging content discovery experiences. By using Entertainment Express, clients can also connect to other services like movie showtimes and ticketing, content recommendations, content availability and TV channel line-ups. With over a million titles, episodes and over 150,000 videos available, IVA makes it easy for developers to integrate all the services they need at a very affordable price.

apis.name: Predix
apis.description: Predix (IoT PaaS) helps you develop apps that connect people with industrial machines through analytics and data for better business outcomes.

apis.name: Flowroute
apis.description: Flowroute is the leading provider of cloud-based communications and is based in Seattle, Washington.

apis.name: Coord
apis.description: Coord is a mobility company that creates seamless mobility and self-driving experiences today through deep integrations. The company offers bike-share API, Curbs API, Tolls API, Routing API and etc.

apis.name: WebTRIS
apis.description: The WebTRIS data available at http://webtris.highwaysengland.co.uk/ is available via an application programming interface (API) in JSON format. This is a free service and there is no need to register to use it. Developers can utilise the WebTRIS data to provide their own services, applications and websites.
